about_us.hero_overview: Enjoy a comprehensive travel experience with the best flight, hotel, and travel package offers at competitive prices. Book your trip easily with reliable services and guidance from travel experts, and explore amazing tourist destinations and unforgettable experiences with exclusive offers that suit all needs.
about_us.hero_brief: Flymoon Travel & Tourism Agency is one of the leading travel agencies in Saudi Arabia, with experience spanning since 2020. It provides comprehensive travel and tourism services for individuals and companies, from flight and hotel bookings to distinctive tourism packages, with a professional and highly experienced team in meeting travelers' needs.

banner.title: Our team cares about your comfortable and enjoyable journey
banner.description: We are here to ensure you have a unique and distinctive travel experience, where we provide you with comprehensive services that match your needs and desires. Discover the world with us confidently and comfortably with our specialized team.

introduction.title: About Flymoon Travel
introduction.description: At Flymoon, we provide comprehensive solutions in travel and tourism. Our services include flight ticket booking, hotel accommodation, visa arrangements, and designing customized tourism programs. We aim to provide a smooth and distinctive travel experience at competitive prices.

services.title: Comprehensive travel services that meet all your needs
services.subtitle: Everything you need for your trip in one place: flights, hotels, visas, and tourism packages.

flight.title: Flight Booking Services
flight.description: Distinguished flight booking with access to exclusive prices, flexible cancellation policies, and round-the-clock support for all your travel needs.

hotels.title: Luxury and Distinguished Accommodations
hotels.description: A curated collection of luxury hotels and resorts and unique accommodations around the world with exclusive facilities and exceptional personal service.

visa.title: Visas and Documentation
visa.description: Comprehensive visa and document processing services with expert guidance for hassle-free international travel.

tours.title: Customized Tourism Packages
tours.description: Customized tourism programs designed to suit your interests, budget, and travel style with expert local guides.

insurance.title: Travel Insurance
insurance.description: Comprehensive travel insurance coverage that protects you against unexpected circumstances and emergencies.

support.title: 24/7 Concierge Support
support.description: Distinguished customer service around the clock with multilingual support and instant assistance worldwide.

direction.title: Our Direction and Vision
direction.subtitle: We lead the future of travel with innovation, excellence, and unwavering commitment to our customers' dreams.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading travel agency in the Middle East, setting new standards for customer service and travel experiences while making the world more accessible to everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional travel services that exceed expectations, create lasting memories, and build meaningful connections between cultures through customized travel experiences.

future.title: Our Future
future.description: Expanding our digital presence, adopting sustainable tourism practices, and continuously innovating to provide advanced travel solutions for the next generation of travelers.

advantages.title: Why Flymoon Leads the Industry
advantages.subtitle: Our unique approach and proven expertise set us apart in the competitive travel industry.

quality.title: Distinguished Quality
quality.description: Carefully selected partners and services that ensure exceptional quality.

team.title: Expert Team
team.description: Experienced travel professionals with deep destination knowledge.

personal.title: Personal Touch
personal.description: Personalized service tailored to individual preferences and needs.

partnerships.title: Trusted Partnerships
partnerships.description: Strong relationships with airlines, hotels, and premium service providers.

awards.title: Award-Winning Service
awards.description: Recognized excellence in customer satisfaction and service quality.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Extensive network covering destinations worldwide with local expertise.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Services
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from our valued customers

questions.question: How can I book a flight ticket?
questions.answer: You can easily book a flight ticket through our website. Select your destination and travel dates, compare prices, and choose the suitable flight. Pay securely and get instant confirmation.

questions.question: Can I modify or cancel my booking?
questions.answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your booking according to the airline's terms and conditions. We offer free cancellation for most bookings within 24 hours of booking.

questions.question: What payment methods are available?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and electronic payments. All transactions are secure and encrypted for your protection.

questions.question: How can I contact customer service?
questions.answer: Customer service is available 24/7 via phone, WhatsApp, and email. You can also contact us through live chat on our website for immediate assistance.

questions.question: Do you provide service in English?
questions.answer: Yes, all our services are available in English with a specialized customer support team that speaks English fluently, along with Arabic support.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: At Flymoon Travel & Tourism, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the Saudi Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL) and its executive regulations. This policy aims to clarify how we collect, use, and protect your data and your rights related to it.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: Entity responsible for data processing: Flymoon Travel & Tourism. You can contact us via email: contact@flymoonsa.com or phone: +1234567890.

data_we_collect.title: Data We Collect
data_we_collect.identity: Identity data: Full name, nationality, mobile number, email address.
data_we_collect.booking: Booking data: Flight details, hotels, number of travelers, preferences.
data_we_collect.payment: Payment data: May be processed through secure payment providers in accordance with PCI-DSS standards.
data_we_collect.usage: Usage data: Cookies, IP address, browser type.

purposes.title: Processing Purposes and Legal Basis
purposes.contract: Executing orders and bookings and providing services (contract performance).
purposes.legitimate: Communication, customer service, and technical support (legitimate interest).
purposes.legal: Compliance with regulatory and tax requirements (legal obligation).
purposes.consent: Marketing with your explicit consent, and you can withdraw consent at any time (consent).

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We may share your data when necessary with service providers (airlines, hotels, payment systems, IT providers) only for service delivery purposes and in compliance with PDPL and appropriate confidentiality and data processing agreements.

cross_border.title: Cross-Border Transfer
cross_border.content: If it becomes necessary to transfer your data outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, this will be done in accordance with regulatory controls and with appropriate protection levels and necessary contractual safeguards.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data only for the period necessary to achieve the stated purposes or as required by law, then we delete or anonymize it securely.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Access your data and request a copy of it.
rights.correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
rights.deletion: Request deletion when the need ceases or processing violates the law.
rights.withdraw: Withdraw consent for marketing at any time without affecting previous processing.
rights.complaint: File a complaint with the competent authority if you have an objection.

security.title: Security and Protection
security.content: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect data from unauthorized access, loss, or modification, with periodic review of these measures.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve browsing experience and analyze performance. You can control cookie settings through your browser settings. Disabling some cookies may reduce website functionality.

minors.title: Minors' Data
minors.content: Our services are directed at adults. In case of processing minors' data, it will be with guardian consent in accordance with the law.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: To exercise your rights or inquire about the policy, contact us at contact@flymoonsa.com or at +1234567890.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will display the last update date at the top of the page, and your continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the updated version.

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_and_conditions.intro: These terms and conditions govern your use of the Flymoon Travel & Tourism website and services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. By accessing or using the website, you agree to these terms.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: "Website": The Flymoon electronic platform. "User": Any person who accesses the website or uses its services. "Services": Include booking flights, hotels, travel packages, and support services.

use.title: Use of the Website
use.item1: Users must provide accurate and up-to-date information.
use.item2: Misuse of the website or attempts to gain unauthorized access are prohibited.
use.item3: We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate policies.

booking.title: Bookings and Payments
booking.item1: Bookings are subject to the terms and conditions of service providers (airlines, hotels).
booking.item2: Prices may include taxes or additional fees according to provider policies.
booking.item3: Payments are processed through secure payment providers, and different cancellation and refund policies may apply.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
cancellation.content: Cancellation policies vary by service type and provider. Relevant terms will be displayed before completing the booking. If a refund is available, it will be processed according to provider policies and applicable regulations.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your data is subject to our privacy policy, which complies with the Saudi Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL). We recommend reviewing the privacy policy.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All trademarks, logos, and textual and visual content on the website are owned by or licensed to Flymoon. They may not be copied or used without prior written permission.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We strive to provide accurate information, but we do not guarantee that the website is completely error-free. We are not liable for indirect damages resulting from use of the website or delays or cancellations of services by providers.

law.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
law.content: These terms are subject to the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and jurisdiction lies with the competent courts within the Kingdom.

changes.title: Modifications
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Your continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the updated version.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any inquiries or complaints, contact us via email at contact@flymoonsa.com or phone at +1234567890.
